alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bourbon County through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Drexel to near Blue Mound to near Iola to 7 miles east of Eureka. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marmaton, Bronson, Uniontown, Fulton, Redfield, Mapleton, Petersburg, Hammond, Devon, Porterville, Harding and Xenia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and west central Missouri.
